description:
As a precise unit converter user app
  I want to convert an physic measure unit
  into another one

steps.name: Given  I open the Precise Unit Conversion App
And  I want to convert "Hectare" to "Square meter"
When  I set a "98798" to be converted
And  I click on delete button
Then  I see the "9879" is shorter than the original value
